name: Getamarket
tag_list: internet, business, b2b, trade, product, service, buy, sell, entrepreneur, professional, network, marketplace
overview:
Getamarket is the first online global business center, where Business Professionals, Entrepreneurs, Employees, Freelancers communicate, do business, trade, and network with each other. Getamarket members own their online offices within this global business center and benefit from all services provided within the system.

Buy and Sell in Getamarket B2B Marketplace Trade: As old and mature as human history, as young and energetic as Getamarket

Getamarket provides all services expected from an excellent B2B Marketplace. Getamarket members easily post Selling & Buying offers, send Partnership requests, and publish their product catalogs. They introduce their companies and products to prestigious companies in all industries, all over the world. They also use Getamarketâ€™s powerful search functions to find any offer, company, and product they are looking for.

Communicate and Network in Getamarket Business Society New meeting point for all segments of global business community

Getamarket is a fresh breath for global business as a new meeting point for all segments of business society. Getamarket members create and join high quality business groups to manage and enlarge their professional networks. Within Getamarketâ€™s global business society, they continuously be in touch with partners, colleagues, friends; while they meet new people and establish new cooperations. Getamarket Groups System supports almost all languages, including Chinese and Russian.

Find Authentic Information in Getamarket Business Guide Tips, guidelines, and hot news about business destinations

Getamarket members can reach exclusive guidelines about important business destinations. They can find comprehensive information about relevant countries, latest business news, latest member activities and offers, popular group articles and more through Country Pages that are updated on regular basis.

Move in to your online Getamarket Office Take your place in the worldâ€™s first global business center

Getamarket provides its members free online offices within its global business center. All members can introduce themselves and their offers to Getamarketâ€™s global network, exhibit their products and services to the world, use a wide variety of services like network lists, live chat, messages and much more. They can also have online web-pages for themselves and their companies separately.
